name: Classy Clash
description:
To play the game run the main application. It's a super basic game, not much to it, I am learning C++ and wanted somewhere to store the games that I make.

Movement WASD to move and left click to attack.

thanks to stealthix for his awesome nature tileset which can be found here

https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset

C++ course used was https://www.udemy.com/course/cpp-fundamentals/

Update: .rar file having issues so uploaded a .7z version to avoid that
